header: Here is our hoped for list for the year!

events.title: Sonning Common School Fair
events.html:
Once we receive confirmation we plan to run two stalls at the Fair.

A book sale and a new game for 2021

events.title: 21st Anniversary
events.html: The Library has been in it's current building for 21 years and we intend to celebrate by hosting several events throughout the year.

events.title: Summer Reading Challenge
events.html: The subject this year will be “Wild World Heroes” and starts on July 14th and finishes on September 11th.

events.title: Summer Holidays
events.html: During the summer we will be organising several events for children - Lego Masters, an art event and several more, we will keep you informed.

events.title: FoSCL Quiz
events.html: Friday 8th October in Sonning Common Village Hall

events.title: AGM
events.html: The Agenda will be sent out in October.

events.title: Christmas Celebration
events.html: Do come and join us in the Library on Wednesday 22nd December from 2.30 pm.
